name: Jelly Cube: Soft Bomb
description:
Jelly Cube, a new concept 3D puzzle game that is designed to train your brain！
◆ Roll and P.O.P jelly cubes of every sort and kind. ◆
◆ Very intuitive control and simple game rule allowing a user to play the game in one hand. ◆
◆ Combination of predictions and selections on various results hidden beneath the game! ◆

Jelly Cube, a world of new puzzle game!
◆ Tilt your screen by sliding top and bottom, left and right side of the 3D plate.
◆ Then the cute jelly cubes will roll and move to one side due to the laws of gravity.
◆ The jelly cubes will pop when the jelly cubes of same color match together.

Jelly Cube, a game that can brighten your mind!
◆ Improve your spatial cognition ability, prediction power, utilization ability, and rapid judgment by playing Jelly Cube.
◆ You will be able to understand the current and the future circumstances regarding the arrangement of jelly cubes.
◆ Your utilization ability will improve as you will be able to create various matching circumstances by combining and separating jelly cubes.
◆ A user's judgment improves as the user has to find out the direction that accomplishes more matching of jelly cubes under time limit.

Jelly Cube, a game easily enjoyed by men and women of all ages!
◆ Very intuitive control: All you have to do is selecting one direction among four directions and sliding the screen.
◆ Simple game rule: The user's role is to match more than three cubes of same color by tilting the screen in order to roll the cubes into one direction.
